name: Graveyard Demo
description:
This demo has a basic in action combat system. Still working out the kinks...
A level up system based on Zelda mechanics... a basic fishing program, a digging minigame, a barrowed key item system, and an advanced weather program. Which I completed a few days ago.

Graveyard demo features

Gear Program
Key Item Program
Heart Piece Leveling Program
New Battle Systems

Phantom Animations (Fading)
New Weather Systems (Advanced) (Completed)
Multi Layering Background Sounds
Password Puzzle System (Experimental)
Randomized Conversation
Randomized Fishing Program
Animated Credits
Animated Game End (Failed)(Fixing)
